title.native: 人間不信の冒険者たちが世界を救うようです
title.romaji: Ningen Fushin no Boukensha-tachi ga Sekai wo Sukuu you desu
title.english: Ningen Fushin: Adventurers Who Don’t Believe in Humanity Will Save the World

description:
Nick used to be a member of a veteran adventurer party, helping his undisciplined friends with the accounts whenever he could. But what was his reward? Getting accused of embezzlement and kicked out by the leader he respected. Before long, he finds a few other jaded adventurers and kindred spirits, and together, they form their own unstoppable party!

(Source: Yen Press)

Note: Each episode streamed one week early on ABEMA.
synonyms: Apparently, Disillusioned Adventurers Will Save the World
Tampaknya para Petualang Misantropis Akan Menyelamatkan Dunia

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Gambling
tags.description: Centers around the act of gambling.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

title.native: 人間不信の冒険者たちが世界を救うようです
人間不信の冒険者たちが世界を救うようです
Never Fear

node.description:
__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.

**Height:** 172 cm

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tokishunichi) | [Official Website](http://tokishunichi.com/) | [Agency Profile](http://www.withline.jp/talent/?id=shunichi_toki)

**Non-Anime Roles**
• Rui Kamishiro (Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku)
• Freminet (Genshin Impact)
• X (Reverse: 1999)

__[Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/nocty-x-rucca/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mizoguchi_rucca)__

__Birthplace:__ Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan

__Introduction:__
Takanori Mizoguchi, alternatively known by stage name RUCCA, is a Japanese lyricist and novelist. 

__Trivia:__
- He uses the name Mizoguchi Takanori (溝口貴紀) mainly when providing material to artists and idols.
- The name RUCCA is mainly used when providing material to the animation and games industry, but was also used once during a special occasion.
- The name L(R)UCCA) used mainly in context, or relation to record label _pure: infinity_, where he provides material for four-piece rock band 100% FREE
- The last name 溝口RUCCA is used as his pen-name when writing novels.

(Source: [Wikipedia (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%BA%9D%E5%8F%A3%E8%B2%B4%E7%B4%80), edited)
